reviewText: i wanted this movie long time ago and I got it for my birthday. I love it; great actors, great movie. The shipping was fast.
It was a fantastic tvseries. But these DVDs. Had no subtitles at all and I don't know Russian.  Have you got these DVDs with subtitles?
yes you do need a multi regional dvd player and need to be able understand Russian. If you can will enjoy this movie. If you have read 'In the First Circle' you will understand it even better.
The problem was that the DVD was in Russian and it lacked subtitles. Since I do not know Russian, I haven't been able to view it.
